title: Hassan Mzonge
text: Hassan Mzonge (born 12 June 1972) is a Tanzanian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201996%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a>.
